title: Mazagan Beach & Golf Resort, Morocco introduces exclusive rewards for VISA cardholders
text:
Mazagan Beach & Golf Resort, Morocco introduces exclusive rewards for VISA cardholders Mazagan Beach & Golf Resort, Morocco introduces exclusive rewards for VISA cardholders Details Category: Special Offers   10:15 Mazagan Beach & Golf Resort, Morocco, has announced its partnership with VISA, offering premium cardholders the opportunity to benefit from a range of exciting incentives with the ‘VISA Cardholders Special Offer.’ Valid until March 2016, upon booking, all VISA cardholders can now take advantage of a host of complimentary luxuries at the resort. These include unlimited access to all kids clubs, Baby, Kidz and Club Rush, as well as all sports and leisure activities, including biking, tennis and access to the luxury fitness centre. Shuttle transfers to and from Casablanca airport are also included. 
VISA GOLD cardholders can further benefit as they automatically receive an upgrade to half board accommodation, whilst VISA PLATINUM, SIGNATURE and INFINITE cardholders receive a 20% discount on rooms booked at the best available rates. For suite bookings, PLATINUM, SIGNATURE and INFINITE VISA cardholders are granted one complimentary golf green fees per room, a 15% discount on Mazagan’s exquisite selection of á la carte restaurants, 2-for-1 spa treatments, and limited-edition welcome amenities. Mazagan Beach & Golf Resort’s VISA offer is bookable until 31 March 2016. The offer cannot be combined with any other promotion or discount, and is valid for best available rates when booking direct via the Mazagan website or Reservation Office. Please quote “VISA OFFER” at the time of booking. A valid VISA card must be presented upon check-in. Related articles
